snippet: After pressure from members of Parliament, Germany’s federal prosecutor announced a formal investigation into the tapping of Chancellor Angela Merkel’s cellphone.
abstract: Germany’s federal prosecutor announces that he has begun a formal investigation into evidence that American intelligence agencies eavesdropped on one of Chancellor Angela Merkel’s cellphones.
lead_paragraph: After pressure from members of Parliament, Germany’s federal prosecutor announced a formal investigation into the tapping of Chancellor Angela Merkel’s cellphone.

headline.main: Germany Begins Inquiry of U.S. in Surveillance Case
headline.print_headline: Germany: Formal Inquiry Is Opened Into Tapping of Merkel’s Cellphone

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
